biotools.summary: Novel approach to estimate gene expression from RNA-seq data that reduces length bias. Once reads have been aligned to a reference genome or transcriptome, using any alignment tool, the expression of a genomic feature, such as a gene, transcript or exon, can be estimated as the maximum read coverage along its sequence. The method is available as a patch for bedtools.

bioschemas.name: Maxcounts
